blocks.text: He loves Commander Riker. Here are some of his favourite quotes:
The look in your eyes, I recognize it. You used to have it for me. Captain, why are we out here chasing comets? Fear is the true enemy, the only enemy.

Sure. You'd be surprised how far a hug goes with Geordi, or Worf. and attack the Romulans. Fear is the true enemy, the only enemy. Some days you get the bear, and some days the bear gets you. Maybe if we felt any human loss as keenly as we feel one of those close to us, human history would be far less bloody. That might've been one of the shortest assignments in the history of Starfleet.
